review_data.title: Great exhibition and food
review_data.content: We came for half a day to this impressive fair which was totally geared around gardening. Plenty of restaurants offered various types of food all of which tasted great.

review_data.title: Enttäuschender Tagesbesuch
review_data.content: Hohe Eintrittspreise, sowie Standpreise. Alles Online billiger. Klare Aussagen einiger Stände fehlten. Uninspirierend. Die Atmosphäre vermittelt das Gefühl, dies sei...More

review_data.title: Great service, food OK
review_data.content: We came for lunch. The place was packed but we found one of the rare places. Service came quickly, was very attentive and fast. Food was not really our taste. A bit flat so total ranking is lower than usual.

review_data.title: Restaurant BBQ in Halle 2
review_data.content: Dieses Restaurant ist zwar nur 5 Tage geöffnet,aber es vermittelt super BBQ-Gerichte in Frühlingshaftem ambiente während der Winterzeit. In so...More
